sentence.Network_en: I suppose they embezzle a lot.
Their surface is rough, quality is inferior, embezzle other brand.
sentence.Network_cn: 它们外观粗糙, 质量低劣, 盗用他人品牌.

sentence.Network_en: No organization or individual shall intervene, embezzle and divert.
sentence.Network_cn: 任何组织和个人不得干涉 、 截留、挪用.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词根联想记忆法词汇教程(三)|联想记忆法背单词 ... embarrass v. 使困窘 embezzle v. 盗用（公款；公物） embody v. 体现；包含.
cut down 削减；缩短embezzle 盗用；挪用；侵占（公款等）entrepreneur 企业家；主办人.
蓝宝词典 ... embed vt. 嵌入，放入 embezzle vt. 盗用；挪用 embolden v. 壮胆；鼓励.

list.abs: CATTI口译高... ... a high degree of complementarity 很强的互补性 combat embezzlement 打击贪污 containment policy 遏制政策.
I suppose they embezzle a lot ., 我想 , 他们贪污了不少.
...nt n.贪污；盗用；侵吞；滥支 【商务用语】embezzlement and theft 贪污盗窃commit embezzlement 盗用（公款）；贪污犯罪2.emission n.（纸币等的）发行；发行额 【商务用语】emission at par 平价.
I do not know if it is true but word is that Melson has been sacked for embezzling company funds .我不知道这是否属实：据说梅尔森因挪用公司的资金被炒了鱿鱼。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'steal'): from Anglo-Norman French embesiler, from besiler in the same sense (compare with Old French besillier 'maltreat, ravage'), of unknown ultimate origin. The current sense dates from the late 16th cent

entry.def: If someone embezzles money that their organization or company has placed in their care, they take it and use it illegally for their own purposes.

example.ex: One former director embezzled $34 million in company funds.
example.tran: 一名前主管挪用了3,400万美元的公司资金。

means.word_mean: 1. appropriate (as property entrusted to one's care) fraudulently to one's own use;

sentences.sentence: "The accountant embezzled thousands of dollars while working for the wealthy family"

auth_sentence.content: If there is more to embezzle, more crooks may be tempted to enter government.
auth_sentence.res_content: If there is more to embezzle, more crooks may be tempted to enter government.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If there is more to embezzle, more crooks may be tempted to enter government.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 动词前缀,通常加在名词前构成动词,表示"进入……之中,包围,成为"; 2. 动词前缀,表示"使……进入状态或加强等意思"

stems_affixes.word_buile: em使……进入状态或加强等意思+pyre火+al……的→进入火,太阳的→天空的
em进入……之中,包围,成为+path感情+y→进入感情
em进入……之中,包围,成为+balm香油→古人用香油保存尸体,引申为"铭记"
em进入+barr栏+ass表动词→被栏住→使难堪
em进入……之中,包围,成为+battle战斗→v.整军备战
em进入……之中,包围,成为+bed范围;床→进入范围→安置
em进入……之中,包围,成为+bezzle毁坏→毁坏[公家的钱]→贪污

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使陷入泥沼, 使不能动弹
stems_affixes.word_buile: em进入……之中,包围,成为+bog泥→v.使陷入泥沼, 使不能动弹
em进入……之中,包围,成为+brace胳膊→进入怀抱
em使……进入状态或加强等意思+bell美好+ish表动词→进入美好→装饰
em使……进入状态或加强等意思+bitter痛苦的→v.使痛苦
em使……进入状态或加强等意思+body身体→[精神]进入身体→体现
em使……进入状态或加强等意思+boss凸出→使凸出
em使……进入状态或加强等意思+brown褐色→v.着褐色, 使成淡黑
em使……进入状态或加强等意思+power权力→v.授权

sentences.en: The clerk embezzled a thousand pounds from the bank where he worked.
sentences.cn: 那个职员在他工作的银行里贪污了一千英镑。
